content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Add the CLI to your PATH After obtaining the key, add the Trend Micro Artifact Scanner (TMAS) CLI to your PATH: export PATH="/path/to/tmas/binary/directory:$PATH" Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. metadata.title: Add the CLI to your PATH
